io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.math

Class ColorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.extensions.image.alg.math.ColorHelper

  • public class ColorHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColorHelper utility provides small helper functions for common color operations.

      • color

        public static int color(int a,
                        int r,
                        int g,
                        int b)
        Converts a set of RGB values into a single color integer
        Parameters:
        a - alpha component 0-255
        r - red component 0-255
        g - green component 0-255
        b - blue component 0-255
        Returns:
        color as single integer

      • hsv

        Converts given hue, saturation, and value into RGB color integer.
        Parameters:
        h - hue 0-1
        s - saturation 0-1
        v - value 0-1
        Returns:

      • modifyHSV

        public static int modifyHSV(int color,
                            int degrees,
                            double saturation,
                            double value)
        Shift a given color by the given hue degrees, saturation, and value
        Parameters:
        color - RGB integer
        degrees - of hue shift
        saturation - amount 0-1
        value - amount 0-1
        Returns:
        new RGB color integer

      • modifyHSL

        public static int modifyHSL(int color,
                            int degrees,
                            double saturation,
                            double lightness)
        Converts a set of RGB values into a single color integer
        Parameters:
        color - RGB color integer
        degrees - degree of hue rotation 0 to 360
        saturation - saturation from -1.0 to 1.0, where 0 is no effect
        lightness - lightness from -1.0 to 1.0, where 0 is no effect
        Returns:
        RGB color that has been manipulated through the HSL space
